input.sentences: we had been waiting for months to see nine inch nails live .
it was our second time seeing them .
soon the concert began and the house lights went down .
the band played all our favorite songs .
the show was fantastic and i did n't want it to end .
output.sentences: I had been waiting to see Nine Inch Nails for months.
It was almost time for the show to start!
The lights went down and the house went quiet as the concert began.
Of all the songs they played, the last one was my favorite.
It was the most fantastic night of my life!
